casebody.data:
THE FIDELITY BANK
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE No. 393PA16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 9, 2016. Donalt J. Eglinton, Attorney at Law, New Bern, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Amy P. Wang, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for The Fidelity Bank. Perry J. Pelaez, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department of Revenue.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 20th of October 2016 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
